attributes.action: Petition for the new Bond film to be released ASAP.
attributes.additional_details: We need a national morale boost.
attributes.background: Lobby the makers of the new Bond film so we can watch it. It’s in the national interest to raise morale.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Deciding when and how to release the new James Bond film is a matter for its distributors, not the Government or House of Commons.
